name: Spearit Bear - “Part of Life” Music NFT
description:
This NFT comes with a downloadable file of Spearit Bear's song "Part of Life" Purchase of this NFT transfers ownership of the digital file and image, not the right to ownership of the music itself. Commercial use of the image or the music file, aside from the resale of this NFT, must be requested and approved by Spearit Bear beforehand. This song was first released on streaming platforms in 2021 but is now exclusively available here.
Album artwork by @resltlesstides_ on TikTok
This song was written at a very difficult point in Spearit Bear's life when it felt like there was no hope. Like nothing they did would create positive results no matter how hard they tried. But by realizing it is a matter of switching your perspective, Spearit Bear was able to work on improving their mindset and ended up writing this song to help if those feelings ever came back. Now they share it with you in this NFT
This music NFT qualifies as one that can be collected to add to the 5 total needed for a collector to be considered a 'Distributor' and receive monthly Distributor pool payments from secondary sale royalties. More info at spearitbear.com/nfts
